attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel the conduct of Lady Scotland is untenable. How can she still keep her position after what she has done employing an illigal immigrant, how do we know that she has ever seen any documentation at all, surely any one in her position would automatically copy all documentation as matter of course. I feel she is not telling the full story, I work in a position were I have to check peoples passports and I/D and would automatically be sacked. She has broken the law she legislated for, How can she stay!!!!!. Why is it again government employees are above the law. She has to go

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
